doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/23/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/23/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm and special guests Denise Alexander, Ortez Alderson, Phillip Reed and Dr. Marjorie Hill, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2.Discussion about race relations in the gay and lesbian political movementCOMMERCIAL:National March on Washington for Lesbian and Gay Rights3.Discussion about the issues of black gay and lesbiansCOMMERCIAL:National March on Washington for Lesbian and Gay Rights4.Criticism about the Pope and his views on homosexuality and AIDS5.Washington Countdown, discussion about political candidates who have supported the march6.Announcement about The Names Project7.Guests Tom Stoddard (Lambda Legal Defense) and Tim Sweeney (Gay Men's Health Crisis) discuss anti-discriminatory policies in regards to AIDS8.News Watch, Chicago doctor has been restored to his duties9.ACLU called upon Regan to reconsider his Advisory AIDS Commission10.Dr. Robert Gallo, co-discoverer of the AIDS virus, has blasted pharmacetual companies for not taking a bigger inititative in research development11.Amsterdam developed a monument for Lesbians and Gays12.Lavender Heatlh, interview with Shelly Neiderbach, founder of the Crime Victims Counseling Services Unit13.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1.Media Watch, Interview with Eric Perez of the Third World People of Color CaucasCOMMERCIAL:The Islanders Club2.Perry Brass, "Short Bits of Wisdom From Daddy"3.Just Ask RazCOMMERCIAL: Gay Treasures4.Jeanne Leonard talks about her tribute to Judy GarlandCOMMERCIAL:The Monster5.Interview with Jim Hubbard from the NY Lesbian & Gay Experimental Film Festival
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 39 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 9/23/1987]: September 1987
